channel.title: git on Computing Club
channel.description: Recent content in git on Computing Club

item.title: Next meeting: introduction to C++
item.description: Hi, Thank you again to Yannick for the two part shell and git introduction he has run the past two weeks. I hope the idea of the (Linux) shell as a development environment and the version control workflow provided by git started to make sense for everyone after a chance to put it into practice. Please feel welcome to continue to play around with this website as a sandbox. Next week, Sofie will very kindly be running an introduction to programming in C++.

item.title: Toolkit I
item.description: In this session I discuss the basic toolkits everyone should know the command line PATH git basics vim basics For further reading, I suggest https://missing.csail.mit.edu/ slides

item.title: Static website generation with Hugo
item.description: Today I unveiled our new website! Thanks to Daniel for hosting. It’s powered by Hugo, a static website generator. The best way to install (the latest version of) Hugo can be found here. In short, download the latest release and add the binary to your path. Here’s how you can add your sessions to the site: Speak to me if you don’t already have write permissions Clone the repo:
